title: New Balance CEO Advocating for Domestic Manufacturing
itunes:title: New Balance CEO Advocating for Domestic Manufacturing
description:
Joe Preston, President and CEO at New Balance, discusses the opening of a new U.S. shoe factory and the commitment to revitalizing American manufacturing.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
